nodes.text: Zana was a female Human living on Belderone during the Galactic Civil War.

Zana had a son named Flint during the Clone Wars with a Jedi Knight, Flint Torul, who was killed at the hands of General Grievous during the Outer Rim Sieges. Zana, forced to raise her son alone, worked as a night shift waitress, but was killed by an All Terrain Armored Transport during the Rebel Alliance attack on Belderone. Flint believed the Alliance was responsible for his mother's death, and so joined the Galactic Empire.
